title: (EN/DE) Offering Free Coaching (B5-S1)
body:
Hello, my name is Dwayne and I'm a diamond 5 LoL player.
I've been playing LoL since season 1 now this doesn't make me good but experienced.
For the preseason I've decided to pick up coaching!
What does that mean for you? It means that YOU have to opportunity to become a greater LoL player for the new season!
If this strokes your interest, feel free to add me ingame to talk about it!
IGN "EnRo BigBalla"
